column3: na muhun nyimpa a susuhoma kitsa ne nsamu."
Erokɔ hen? Na ɔsee me dɛ

column4: ɔbɔfo a ɔnye me kasae no fiir edzi
column5: na ɔbɔfo fofor fiir edzi kehyiaa no
column11: Jerusalɛm wɔbɛtsena mu dɛ nkuroba a wonnyi afasu
column12: ɔnam nyimpa na anyɛmbowa dodow a wɔwɔ mu ntsi."

column4: mara na mebɛyɛ gya fasu mabɔ no ho aprɔw
column5: na mayɛ enyimnyam wɔ ne finimfin."

column4: guan fi kwaamu afamu asaase no do
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse: na matserɛw hom mu dɛ sor mframa anan no
ɔwo a enye Babilɔn babaa tse."

column2: "Na mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: M'enyimnyam ntsi na masoma wo amanaman a wɔfaa hom afo no nkyɛn: na nyia ɔka hom no

column4: mobɔwosow me nsa egu hɔn do
column5: na wɔayɛ afodze ama hɔn a wɔsoom hɔn no: na obiara bohu dɛ dɔm EWURADZE na ɔasoma me."

column3: tow ndwom na dzi ehurusi: na

column2: "Na amanaman pii dze hɔnho bɔbɔ EWURADZE ho wɔ da no mu
column3: na wɔayɛ me man: na mebɛtsena wo mu
column4: na ehu dɛ dɔm EWURADZE na ɔasoma me wo nkyɛn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛfa Juda edzi do dɛ ne kyɛfa wɔ asaase krɔnkrɔn no do
column3: na ɔada ho asan mu eyi Jerusalɛm."
hom ntaa dzinn wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na ɔasoɛr wɔ ne tsenabea krɔnkrɔn hɔ."
